sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Updated cost, preparation start, cleanup start and delivery time in reservation cases, workplace service cases and requested service items.</description> <name>Populate cost and prepration start time</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (new GlidePluginManager().isActive("com.sn_wsd_rsv")) sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().action('sn_wsd_case.populate_cost_in_itemtaskcase').inBackground().run();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-07 04:51:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>232263ab771121107788ed3e9f5a9939</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate cost and prepration start time</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_232263ab771121107788ed3e9f5a9939</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-20 04:55:08</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Populate cost and prepration start time
